tooltip.item.knightlib.filled_grail: §8§oTo drink from it is to dance with death itself.
tooltip.item.knightlib.great_chalice: §8§oWhispers names you've never heard... yet somehow remember.
tooltip.item.knightlib.great_essence: §8§oEven kings become fuel in the end.
tooltip.item.knightlib.homunculus: §8§oA malformed miracle, bound by alchemy’s price.
tooltip.item.knightlib.small_essence: §8§oThe last sigh of a life that changed nothing.
